Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: ai rasool apane aaleeshaan paravaradigaar ke naam kee tasbeeh karo
jisane (har cheez ko) paida kiya
aur duroost kiya aur jisane (usaka) andaaza muqarrar kiya phir raah bataayee
aur jisane (haivaanaat ke lie) chaara ugaaya
phir khushk use siyaah rang ka kooda kar diya
ham tumhen (aisa) padha denge ki kabhee bhoolo hee nahin
magar jo khuda chaahe (mansookh kar de) beshak vah khulee baat ko bhee jaanata hai aur chhupe hue ko bhee
aur ham tumako aasaan tareeke kee taufeeq denge
to jahaan tak samajhaana mufeed ho samajhate raho
jo khauph rakhata ho vah to phauree samajh jaega
aur badabakht usase pahaloo tahee karega
jo (qayaamat mein) badee (tez) aag mein daakhil hoga
phir na vahaan marega hee na jeeyega
vah yaqeenan muraad dilee ko pahuncha jo (shirk se) paak ho
aur apane paravaradigaar ka zikr karata aur namaaz padhata raha
magar tum log duniyaavee zindagee ko tarajeeh dete ho
haaloki aakhorat kaheen behatar aur der pa hai
beshak yahee baat agale saheefon
ibaraaheem aur moosa ke saheefon mein bhee hai
bhala tumako dhaanp lene vaalee museebat (qayaamat) ka haal maalum hua hai
us din bahut se chehare zaleel roosava honge
(tauq va janzeer se) mayakqat karane vaale
thake maande dahakatee huee aag mein daakhil honge
unhen ek khaulate hue chashamen ka paanee pilaaya jaega
khaaradaar jhaadee ke siva unake lie koee khaana nahin
jo motaee paida kare na bhookh mein kuchh kaam aaega
(aur) bahut se chehare us din taro taaza honge
apanee koshish (ke nateeje) par shaadamaan
ek aaleeshaan baag mein
vahaan koee lago baat sunenge hee nahin
usamen chashmen jaaree hongen
usamen oonche oonche takht bichhe honge
aur (unake kinaare) gilaas rakhe honge
aur gaanv takie qataar kee qataar lage honge
aur nafees masanade bichhee huee
to kya ye log oont kee tarah gaur nahin karate ki kaisa ajeeb paida kiya gaya hai
aur aasamaan kee taraph ki kya buland banaaya gaya hai
aur pahaadon kee taraf ki kis tarah khade kie gae hain
aur zameen kee taraph ki kis tarah bichhaayee gayee hai
to tum naseehat karate raho tum to bas naseehat karane vaale ho
tum kuchh un par daroga to ho nahin
haan jisane munh pher liya
aur na maana to khuda usako bahut bade azaab kee saza dega
beshak unako hamaaree taraf laut kar aana hai
phir unaka hisaab hamaare zimme hai
subah kee qasam
aur das raaton kee
aur zupht va taaq kee
aur raat kee jab aane lage
aklamand ke vaaste to zaroor badee qasam hai (ki kuphfaar par zaroor azaab hoga)
kya tumane dekha nahin ki tumhaare aad ke saath kya kiya
yaani iram vaale daraaz qad
jinaka misal tamaam (duniya ke) shaharon mein koee paida hee nahin kiya gaya
aur samood ke saath (kya kiya) jo vaadee (qara) mein patthar taraash kar ghar banaate the
aur phiraun ke saath (kya kiya) jo (saza ke lie) mekhe rakhata tha
ye log mukhatalif shaharon mein sarakash ho rahe the
aur unamen bahut se fasaad phaila rakhe the
to tumhaare paravaradigaar ne un par azaab ka koda lagaaya
beshak tumhaara paravaradigaar taak mein hai
lekin insaan jab usako usaka paravaradigaar (is tarah) aazamaata hai ki usako ijzat va neamat deta hai, to kahata hai ki mere paravaradigaar ne mujhe ijzat dee hai
magar jab usako (is tarah) aazamaata hai ki us par rozee ko tang kar deta hai bol uthata hai ki mere paravaradigaar ne mujhe zaleel kiya
haragiz nahin balki tum log na yateem kee khaatiradaaree karate ho
aur na mohataaj ko khaana khilaane kee tarageeb dete ho
aur meeraara ke maal (halaal va haraam) ko samet kar chakh jaate ho
aur maal ko bahut hee azeez rakhate ho
sun rakho ki jab zameen koot koot kar reza reza kar dee jaegee
aur tumhaare paravaradigaar ka hukm aur farishte kataar ke kataar aa jaenge
aur us din jahannum saamane kar dee jaegee us din insaan chaunkega magar ab chaunkana kahaan (faayada dega)
(us vakt) qahega ki kaash maine apanee (is) zindagee ke vaaste kuchh pahale bheja hota
to us din khuda aisa azaab karega ki kisee ne vaisa azaab na kiya hoga
aur na koee usake jakadane kee tarah jakadega
(aur kuchh logon se kahega) ai itmenaan paane vaalee jaan
apane paravaradigaar kee taraf chal too usase khush vah tujh se raazee
to mere (khaas) bandon mein shaamil ho ja
aur mere behisht mein daakhil ho ja
